name: Aioli
description: While "aioli" is thrown around incredibly loosely for any mayo-like sauce, it's really only one thing: garlic mayonnaise, which is great for adding a creamy garlic bite to sandwiches, fries, or really any such thing your heart desires.

recipeInstructions.text: Using a mortar and pestle, work garlic and salt into a paste.
In a medium bowl, whisk together garlic paste, egg yolks, lemon juice, and mustard.

Whisking constantly, start adding in canola and extra-virgin olive oil in a slow, steady stream until all oil is used and sauce is thick. Use immediately or store in an air-tight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week.
